mapper.update: update order set o_id = #{oId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, o_time = #{oTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, o_id_list = #{oIdList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, o_site = #{oSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, o_remarks = #{oRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, received_1 = #{received1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, received_2 = #{received2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, o_id, o_time, o_id_list, u_id, o_site, o_remarks, received_1, received_2 from order
